[93mreaction[0m ([93mHOR[0m) [93mdecline[0m by [93morders[0m of [93mmagnitude[0m when [93mvarying[0m from [93macidic[0m to [93malkaline[0m [93menvironments[0m. [93mConsequently[0m, [93mprominent[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mintermediates[0m under [93mvarying[0m [93mpH[0m [93mconditions[0m [93mremain[0m [93msignificant[0m [93myet[0m [93mchallenging[0m. [93md[0m-[93mp[0m [95mhybridized[0m [93mPd[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcatalysts[0m are [95minvestigated[0m under [93mdifferent[0m [93melectrolyte[0m [93mpH[0m, [93mparticularly[0m in [93malkaline[0m and [93macidic[0m [93mconditions[0m. [93mRemarkably[0m, the [93mspecific[0m [93mactivity[0m of [93mPdGa[0m/[93mC[0m [93malloy[0m [93msurpasses[0m that of [93mPdGa[0m/[93mC[0m [93malloy[0m [93mexhibits[0m the [93msmallest[0m [93macid[0m-[93mbase[0m [93mkinetic[0m [93mgap[0m among these [93mcatalysts[0m. [93mCombining[0m [93mexperimental[0m [93mresults[0m and [93mtheoretical[0m [93mcalculations[0m, it is [93mdetermined[0m that the [93mincorporation[0m of [93mGa[0m [93moptimizes[0m the [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m of [93mPd[0m [93mvia[0m [93md[0m-[93mp[0m [93morbital[0m [95mhybridization[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93menhancing[0m the [93madsorption[0m [93mgap[0m. [93mMore[0m [93mcritically[0m, it [93mcan[0m be [93minferred[0m that the [93mdecisive[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mspecies[0m for [93mHOR[0m [93mvary[0m with [93mincreasing[0m [93mpH[0m, [93mnamely[0m, it [93mtransitions[0m from [93mH[0m/[93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mO[0m [93mspecies[0m in [93macidic[0m [93mconditions[0m to - [93mThermostable[0m [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m, [93m1[0m. [93mThermotropic[0m [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m: [93mAbstract[0m [93mNew[0m [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblock[0m [93mcopolymers[0m were [93mprepared[0m by [93mpolycondensation[0m of [93maminoterminated[0m [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblocks[0m with [93mmolecular[0m [93mweights[0m from [93m700[0m to [93m6[0m [93m000[0m with [93mterephthaloyl[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93misophthaloyl[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93m2[0m,[93m6[0m‐[93mnaphthalenedicarbonyl[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93madipoly[0m [93mdichloride[0m, [93mdichlorodimethylsilane[0m or [93mdichlorotetramethylsiloxane[0m as [93mlow[0m‐[93mmolecular[0m‐[93mweight[0m [93mdifunctional[0m [93mcoupling[0m [93mreagents[0m. The [93mpoly[0m([93mester[0m‐[93mimide[0m) [93mblocks[0m were [93msynthesized[0m from [93mreadily[0m [93maccessible[0m [93mmonomers[0m. [93mDependent[0m on [93mblock[0m [93mcomposition[0m, [93mmolecular[0m [93mweight[0m of the [93mblock[0m ([93mblock[0m [93mlength[0m) and [93mkind[0m of [93mspacer[0m [93mliquid[0m‐[93mcrystalline[0m [93mpolymers[0m were [93mobtained[0m with [93mhigh[0m [93mthermal[0m [93mstability[0m and [93msolubility[0m in [93mpolar[0m [93msolvents[0m, [93myielding[0m [93mtough[0m [93mfilms[0m with [93mgood[0m [93mmechanical[0m [93mproperties[0m.
